originalContent
option.value:
# Ban Plugin Configuration # Configure ban reasons, durations, and IDs
settings: use-id-system: ban: true # true = use IDs (1,2,3), false = use reasons directly mute: true # true = use IDs (1,2,3), false = use reasons directly
bans: 1: reason: "Cheating/Hacking" duration: "30d" 2: reason: "Griefing" duration: "7d" 3: reason: "Spam/Advertising" duration: "1h" 4: reason: "Toxic Behavior" duration: "3d" 5: reason: "Exploiting" duration: "14d" 6: reason: "Inappropriate Username" duration: "1d" 7: reason: "Ban Evasion" duration: "60d" 8: reason: "Staff Disrespect" duration: "2d"
mutes: 1: reason: "Chat Spam" duration: "1h" 2: reason: "Insulting Players" duration: "2h" 3: reason: "Racism" duration: "7d" 4: reason: "Advertising" duration: "1d" 5: reason: "Toxic Behavior" duration: "3d"
# Duration format: # s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days # Examples: 30s, 5m, 2h, 7d
# Messages messages: ban-success: "&aSuccessfully banned &c{player} &afor &e{reason} &afor &c{duration}" unban-success: "&aSuccessfully unbanned &c{player}" kick-success: "&aSuccessfully kicked &c{player} &afor &e{reason}" player-not-found: "&cPlayer not found!" player-not-online: "&cPlayer is not online!" invalid-ban-id: "&cInvalid ban ID! Available IDs: {ids}" no-permission: "&cYou don't have permission to use this command!" player-banned: "&cYou are banned from this server!\n&cReason: &e{reason}\n&cExpires: &e{expires}" player-kicked: "&cYou have been kicked from the server!\n&cReason: &e{reason}" already-banned: "&c{player} is already banned!" not-banned: "&c{player} is not banned!" cannot-ban-staff: "&cYou cannot ban this player - they have bypass permission!" cannot-kick-staff: "&cYou cannot kick this player - they have bypass permission!" usage-ban: "&cUsage: /ban <player> <id>" usage-unban: "&cUsage: /unban <player>" usage-kick: "&cUsage: /kick <player> <reason>" mute-success: "&aSuccessfully muted &c{player} &afor &e{reason} &afor &c{duration}" unmute-success: "&aSuccessfully unmuted &c{player}" player-muted: "&cYou have been muted in this server!\n&cReason: &e{reason}\n&cExpires: &e{expires}" player-unmuted: "&cYou have been unmuted in this server!" already-muted: "&c{player} is already muted!" not-muted: "&c{player} is not muted!" cannot-mute-staff: "&cYou cannot mute this player - they have bypass permission!" usage-mute: "&cUsage: /mute <player> <mute-id>" invalid-mute-id: "&cInvalid mute ID! Available IDs: {ids}" history: title: "&8History of {player}" no-entries: "&cNo history entries found" entry: ban: "&eBan" mute: "&eMute" by: "&7By: &f{staff}" reason: "&7Reason: &f{reason}" date: "&7Date: &f{date}" duration: permanent: "&7Duration: &fPermanent" temporary: "&7Duration: &f{duration}" invalid-player: "&cPlease enter a valid player name" history-usage: "&cUsage: /history <player>" reload-success: "&aConfiguration successfully reloaded!" freeze: title: main: "&cYou have been frozen!" subtitle: "&7Contact a staff member in the discord" frozen-by: "&aYou have frozen {player}" already-frozen: "&cThis player is already frozen" not-frozen: "&cThis player is not frozen" unfrozen: "&aYou have been unfrozen" unfrozen-by: "&aYou have unfrozen {player}" freeze-usage: "&cUsage: /freeze <player>" unfreeze-usage: "&cUsage: /unfreeze <player>" cannot-target-self: "&cYou cannot target yourself!" staff-bypass: "&cYou cannot target this player - they have bypass permission!" examine: title: "&8Examining {player}" usage: "&cUsage: /examine <player>" offline: "&cPlayer must be online to be examined" info: name: "&7Name: &f{name}" uuid: "&7UUID: &f{uuid}" ip: "&7IP: &f{ip}" location: "&7Location: &f{world}, {x}, {y}, {z}" gamemode: "&7Gamemode: &f{gamemode}" health: "&7Health: &f{health}/20" food: "&7Food: &f{food}/20" exp: "&7Experience: &f{exp}" op: "&7Operator: &f{op}" vanish: enabled: "&aVanish mode enabled" disabled: "&cVanish mode disabled" invsee: usage: "&cUsage: /invsee <player>" opened: "&aViewing inventory of &e{player}" view-only: "&cYou are in view-only mode. You cannot modify this inventory."
usage-format: divider: "&7&m--------------------------------" ban-command: header: "&cUsage: &7/ban <player> <ban-id>" list-header: "&cAvailable Ban IDs:" format: "&7ID: &c{id} &7| Reason: &c{reason} &7| Duration: &c{duration}" mute-command: header: "&cUsage: &7/mute <player> <mute-id>" list-header: "&cAvailable Mute IDs:" format: "&7ID: &c{id} &7| Reason: &c{reason} &7| Duration: &c{duration}" kick-command: header: "&cUsage: &7/kick <player> <reason>" list-header: "&cKick Command Help:" info: "&7Write your custom kick reason after the player name." example: "&7Example: &c/kick Player1 Breaking the rules"

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Ban Plugin Configuration # Configure ban reasons, durations, and IDs
settings: use-id-system: ban: true # true = use IDs (1,2,3), false = use reasons directly mute: true # true = use IDs (1,2,3), false = use reasons directly
bans: 1: reason: "Cheating/Hacking" duration: "30d" 2: reason: "Griefing" duration: "7d" 3: reason: "Spam/Advertising" duration: "1h" 4: reason: "Toxic Behavior" duration: "3d" 5: reason: "Exploiting" duration: "14d" 6: reason: "Inappropriate Username" duration: "1d" 7: reason: "Ban Evasion" duration: "60d" 8: reason: "Staff Disrespect" duration: "2d"
mutes: 1: reason: "Chat Spam" duration: "1h" 2: reason: "Insulting Players" duration: "2h" 3: reason: "Racism" duration: "7d" 4: reason: "Advertising" duration: "1d" 5: reason: "Toxic Behavior" duration: "3d"
# Duration format: # s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days # Examples: 30s, 5m, 2h, 7d
# Messages messages: ban-success: "&aSuccessfully banned &c{player} &afor &e{reason} &afor &c{duration}" unban-success: "&aSuccessfully unbanned &c{player}" kick-success: "&aSuccessfully kicked &c{player} &afor &e{reason}" player-not-found: "&cPlayer not found!" player-not-online: "&cPlayer is not online!" invalid-ban-id: "&cInvalid ban ID! Available IDs: {ids}" no-permission: "&cYou don't have permission to use this command!" player-banned: "&cYou are banned from this server!\n&cReason: &e{reason}\n&cExpires: &e{expires}" player-kicked: "&cYou have been kicked from the server!\n&cReason: &e{reason}" already-banned: "&c{player} is already banned!" not-banned: "&c{player} is not banned!" cannot-ban-staff: "&cYou cannot ban this player - they have bypass permission!" cannot-kick-staff: "&cYou cannot kick this player - they have bypass permission!" usage-ban: "&cUsage: /ban <player> <id>" usage-unban: "&cUsage: /unban <player>" usage-kick: "&cUsage: /kick <player> <reason>" mute-success: "&aSuccessfully muted &c{player} &afor &e{reason} &afor &c{duration}" unmute-success: "&aSuccessfully unmuted &c{player}" player-muted: "&cYou have been muted in this server!\n&cReason: &e{reason}\n&cExpires: &e{expires}" player-unmuted: "&cYou have been unmuted in this server!" already-muted: "&c{player} is already muted!" not-muted: "&c{player} is not muted!" cannot-mute-staff: "&cYou cannot mute this player - they have bypass permission!" usage-mute: "&cUsage: /mute <player> <mute-id>" invalid-mute-id: "&cInvalid mute ID! Available IDs: {ids}" history: title: "&8History of {player}" no-entries: "&cNo history entries found" entry: ban: "&eBan" mute: "&eMute" by: "&7By: &f{staff}" reason: "&7Reason: &f{reason}" date: "&7Date: &f{date}" duration: permanent: "&7Duration: &fPermanent" temporary: "&7Duration: &f{duration}" invalid-player: "&cPlease enter a valid player name" history-usage: "&cUsage: /history <player>" reload-success: "&aConfiguration successfully reloaded!" freeze: title: main: "&cYou have been frozen!" subtitle: "&7Contact a staff member in the discord" frozen-by: "&aYou have frozen {player}" already-frozen: "&cThis player is already frozen" not-frozen: "&cThis player is not frozen" unfrozen: "&aYou have been unfrozen" unfrozen-by: "&aYou have unfrozen {player}" freeze-usage: "&cUsage: /freeze <player>" unfreeze-usage: "&cUsage: /unfreeze <player>" cannot-target-self: "&cYou cannot target yourself!" staff-bypass: "&cYou cannot target this player - they have bypass permission!" examine: title: "&8Examining {player}" usage: "&cUsage: /examine <player>" offline: "&cPlayer must be online to be examined" info: name: "&7Name: &f{name}" uuid: "&7UUID: &f{uuid}" ip: "&7IP: &f{ip}" location: "&7Location: &f{world}, {x}, {y}, {z}" gamemode: "&7Gamemode: &f{gamemode}" health: "&7Health: &f{health}/20" food: "&7Food: &f{food}/20" exp: "&7Experience: &f{exp}" op: "&7Operator: &f{op}" vanish: enabled: "&aVanish mode enabled" disabled: "&cVanish mode disabled" invsee: usage: "&cUsage: /invsee <player>" opened: "&aViewing inventory of &e{player}" view-only: "&cYou are in view-only mode. You cannot modify this inventory." clearinv: usage: "&cUsage: /clearinv [player]" cleared-self: "&aYour inventory has been cleared" cleared-other: "&aCleared inventory of &e{player}" cleared-by: "&cYour inventory has been cleared by &e{staff}"
usage-format: divider: "&7&m--------------------------------" ban-command: header: "&cUsage: &7/ban <player> <ban-id>" list-header: "&cAvailable Ban IDs:" format: "&7ID: &c{id} &7| Reason: &c{reason} &7| Duration: &c{duration}" mute-command: header: "&cUsage: &7/mute <player> <mute-id>" list-header: "&cAvailable Mute IDs:" format: "&7ID: &c{id} &7| Reason: &c{reason} &7| Duration: &c{duration}" kick-command: header: "&cUsage: &7/kick <player> <reason>" list-header: "&cKick Command Help:" info: "&7Write your custom kick reason after the player name." example: "&7Example: &c/kick Player1 Breaking the rules"

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
name: Smartbans version: 'BETA 1.4' main: org.viirless.smartban.BanPlugin api-version: '1.21'
commands: ban: description: Ban a player with configurable reasons usage: /ban <player> <id> unban: description: Unban a player usage: /unban <player> kick: description: Kick a player with a custom reason usage: /kick <player> <reason> mute: description: Mute a player with configurable reasons usage: /mute <player> <id> unmute: description: Unmute a player usage: /unmute <player> history: description: View a player's ban and mute history usage: /history <player> smartbans: description: Reload the plugin configuration usage: /smartbans reload freeze: description: Freeze a player usage: /freeze <player> unfreeze: description: Unfreeze a player usage: /unfreeze <player> examine: description: Examine detailed information about a player usage: /examine <player> vanish: description: Toggle vanish mode usage: /vanish aliases: [v] invsee: description: View another player's inventory usage: /invsee <player>
permissions: banplugin.ban: description: Allows banning players default: op banplugin.unban: description: Allows unbanning players default: op banplugin.kick: description: Allows kicking players default: op banplugin.mute: description: Allows muting players default: op banplugin.unmute: description: Allows unmuting players default: op banplugin.bypass: description: Prevents being banned, kicked or muted by other staff members default: op banplugin.history: description: Allows viewing ban and mute history of players default: op banplugin.reload: description: Allows reloading the plugin configuration default: op banplugin.admin: description: Grants all administrative permissions default: op children: banplugin.ban: true banplugin.unban: true banplugin.kick: true banplugin.mute: true banplugin.unmute: true banplugin.history: true banplugin.reload: true banplugin.invsee: true banplugin.invsee.modify: true banplugin.freeze: description: Allows freezing players default: op banplugin.unfreeze: description: Allows unfreezing players default: op banplugin.freeze.bypass: description: Prevents being frozen default: op banplugin.examine: description: Allows examining detailed player information default: op banplugin.vanish: description: Allows using vanish mode default: op banplugin.vanish.see: description: Allows seeing vanished staff members default: op banplugin.invsee: description: Allows viewing other players' inventories default: op banplugin.invsee.bypass: description: Prevents inventory from being viewed default: op banplugin.invsee.modify: description: Allows modifying inventories while using invsee default: op banplugin.*: description: Grants all plugin permissions including bypass default: op children: banplugin.admin: true banplugin.bypass: true

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
name: Smartbans version: 'BETA 1.4' main: org.viirless.smartban.BanPlugin api-version: '1.21'
commands: ban: description: Ban a player with configurable reasons usage: /ban <player> <id> unban: description: Unban a player usage: /unban <player> kick: description: Kick a player with a custom reason usage: /kick <player> <reason> mute: description: Mute a player with configurable reasons usage: /mute <player> <id> unmute: description: Unmute a player usage: /unmute <player> history: description: View a player's ban and mute history usage: /history <player> smartbans: description: Reload the plugin configuration usage: /smartbans reload freeze: description: Freeze a player usage: /freeze <player> unfreeze: description: Unfreeze a player usage: /unfreeze <player> examine: description: Examine detailed information about a player usage: /examine <player> vanish: description: Toggle vanish mode usage: /vanish aliases: [v] invsee: description: View another player's inventory usage: /invsee <player> clearinv: description: Clear a player's inventory usage: /clearinv [player] aliases: [ci]
permissions: banplugin.ban: description: Allows banning players default: op banplugin.unban: description: Allows unbanning players default: op banplugin.kick: description: Allows kicking players default: op banplugin.mute: description: Allows muting players default: op banplugin.unmute: description: Allows unmuting players default: op banplugin.bypass: description: Prevents being banned, kicked or muted by other staff members default: op banplugin.history: description: Allows viewing ban and mute history of players default: op banplugin.reload: description: Allows reloading the plugin configuration default: op banplugin.admin: description: Grants all administrative permissions default: op children: banplugin.ban: true banplugin.unban: true banplugin.kick: true banplugin.mute: true banplugin.unmute: true banplugin.history: true banplugin.reload: true banplugin.invsee: true banplugin.invsee.modify: true banplugin.freeze: description: Allows freezing players default: op banplugin.unfreeze: description: Allows unfreezing players default: op banplugin.freeze.bypass: description: Prevents being frozen default: op banplugin.examine: description: Allows examining detailed player information default: op banplugin.vanish: description: Allows using vanish mode default: op banplugin.vanish.see: description: Allows seeing vanished staff members default: op banplugin.invsee: description: Allows viewing other players' inventories default: op banplugin.invsee.bypass: description: Prevents inventory from being viewed default: op banplugin.invsee.modify: description: Allows modifying inventories while using invsee default: op banplugin.clearinv: description: Allows clearing inventories default: op banplugin.clearinv.bypass: description: Prevents inventory from being cleared default: op banplugin.*: description: Grants all plugin permissions including bypass default: op children: banplugin.admin: true banplugin.bypass: true
